tourName: Czech Republic, Slovakia and Poland family tour
placesVisited: Prague, Czech Republic, Tatra Mountains, Overnight sleeper train, Tatranska Lomnica, Slovakia, Spissky Castle, Pieniny National Park, Poland, Krakow, Activities include: hiking, mountain biking, river rafting
generalInfo:
Take the family on a good old-fashioned adventure next summer and you’ll soon be singing the praises of Poland, Slovakia and the Czech Republic all the way from Prague to Krakow.

This tri-country tour features overnight sleeper trains, astronomical clocks and medieval castles with a healthy balance of outdoor activities and cultural encounters to ensure you all get to experience Eastern Europe from a whole host of uniquely different angles.

Cable cars, fresh coffee and homemade apple cake always make Slovakia a big family favourite with alpine hiking trails leading to waterfalls and mountain huts providing the perfect place for a picnic before riding the rails into the valley below.

White water rafting, mountain biking and the freedom to relax and breath in the fresh air are what family tours are all about with time spent exploring in the Tatra Mountains and on the Dunajec River certain to stay in the memory banks for many more years to come.

dayInfo.description: Welcome to Prague! Arrive in Prague and enjoy a comfortable group transfer to your hotel. Meet your group's tour leader and other families for an introductory meeting, where you'll learn about the exciting plans for the next seven days. Depending on your arrival time, you'll have some free time to explore this beautiful city's charming streets and iconic sights. Overnight: Prague

Family Adventure in Prague, then overnight train to the Tatra Mountains. Discover the historic centre with a local guide as you stroll through narrow streets, medieval squares, and iconic landmarks like Charles Bridge and the Orloj astronomical clock. In the evening, board the sleeper train to Slovakia’s High Tatras—a fun and memorable experience for the kids! Overnight: sleeper train, your children will love it

High Tatras Adventure: Lakes, Huts & Waterfalls Welcome to the stunning High Tatras! After check-in and time to relax, we take a scenic tram to Tatranska Lomnica and a cable car to Skalnate Pleso (1,751m), a crystal-clear mountain lake beneath Lomnicky Peak (2,634m). Hike a family-friendly trail through the Tatras, passing mountain huts and waterfalls. Enjoy lunch at Zamkovskeho hut, visit Cold Creek waterfalls, and explore Rainerova hut, the oldest in the Tatras. Walking: 4,5hrs, 11km/6,8mi, 400m up, 400m down. Meals included: Breakfast, Packed Lunch Overnight: Smokovec

Explore Spissky Castle, UNESCO Levoca & Relax at AquaCity Poprad. A short drive takes you to the impressive 12th-century Spissky Castle, one of Central-Eastern Europe’s largest. A local guide will share fascinating stories, bringing the history to life for kids. Explore medieval Levoca, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, before heading to AquaCity Poprad for fun in thermal pools, water slides, and relaxation. Overnight: Smokovec

Mountain Tram to Strbske Pleso & Hike to Skok Waterfall Hop on the Tatra tram to Štrbské Pleso, the highest village in Slovakia, passing through charming spa villages and enjoying stunning mountain views. From there, set off on a scenic hike to Skok Waterfall, a perfect family-friendly adventure surrounded by lush alpine meadows. Keep an eye out for Tatra chamois and other wildlife as you explore. Enjoy a picnic with breathtaking views before returning to Štrbské Pleso, where you can relax by the glacial lake before taking the tram. Walking: 3 Hours, 11km/7mi, 462m up, 462m down Meals included: Breakfast, Packed Lunch Overnight: Smokovec

Raft, Hike, Bike: Explore the National Park of Pieniny Start your day with an exhilarating 9 km rafting trip through the stunning 23km Dunajec Gorge, surrounded by towering cliffs and lush forests. Perfect for families, this adventure is even suitable for younger children! After a tasty lunch at a traditional restaurant, cycle along the scenic Dunajec River to the legendary Red Monastery. Discover its fascinating stories, including the tale of monk Cyprian, before driving to Krakow. Walking: 20 minutes, 1km/0,6mi, 0m up, 22m down Cycling: 1 hour, 8km/4,9mi, 73m up, 67m down Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Krakow

Family Adventure in Krakow Krakow, a UNESCO World Heritage City, is famed for its Old Town, which features city walls, 46 spires, narrow streets, and Europe’s largest medieval market square. Enjoy a family-friendly guided tour, then spend the afternoon exploring Krakow. For a deeper historical experience, choose an optional visit to the Wieliczka Salt Mines or Auschwitz concentration camp. Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Krakow
Your tour ends Enjoy a comfortable transfer to Krakow Airport, marking the end of your unforgettable family adventure. Meals included: Breakfast
